Name: Celery Sour
Ingredients: 10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Review: This aptly named drink is beautifully balanced with delicate celery flavours.
History: A cocktail named the Celery Sour first appears in Tom-Bullock's 1917 book, The Ideal Bartender .
Nutrition: One serving of Celery Sour contains 157 calories
